amendment.description: To terminate a rule relating to the definition of "waters of the United States".

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3021, as modified, agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 34. Record Vote Number: 138.

Amendment SA 3021 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2911. (consideration: CR S4329; text: CR S4329) To terminate a rule relating to the definition of "waters of the United States".
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3021 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2911.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3021, as modified, agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 34. Record Vote Number: 138.
